about.heading: About Me
about.bio: I am a PhD candidate in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence at Stevens Institute of Technology, with a strong focus on developing autonomous systems for smart manufacturing. My research integrates Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, and Electrical Engineering expertise to create self-aware automated manufacturing systems aligned with Industry 4.0. I have extensive hands-on experience in Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and Reinforcement Learning, with proven ability to consistently achieve results in both academic research and industrial applications.
highlights: PhD in Robotics & AI from Stevens Institute of Technology (GPA: 4.0/4.0)
5+ years combined industrial and academic experience in ML and Computer Vision
Published researcher with multiple peer-reviewed papers in top conferences
Proven expertise in TensorFlow, Python, MATLAB, and Reinforcement Learning
Strong background in autonomous defect detection and control systems
Green Card holder available for immediate start

projects.title: Deep Learning Solution for Real-time Quality Assessment in Additive Manufacturing
projects.description: Developed AI-based application for real-time melt pool analysis using point cloud data in direct energy deposition additive manufacturing. Achieved processing time reduction from 120 seconds to less than 1 second using deep learning models.

projects.title: Autonomous Defect Detection System for 3D Printing
projects.description: Implemented Reinforcement Learning-based controller for anomaly detection and error mitigation in additive manufacturing processes. Patent pending for the autonomous process adjustment algorithm.

projects.title: In-situ Laser-based Process Monitoring Using Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed machine learning solution for in-plane surface anomaly identification in additive manufacturing using point cloud data and advanced ML techniques.

projects.title: Image-based Dataset for Additive Manufacturing ML Applications
projects.description: Created and published comprehensive image-based dataset of artifact surfaces fabricated by additive manufacturing with applications in machine learning research.

projects.title: Johnson & Johnson Financial Analytics Dashboard
